DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to assess the effect of a cognitive group intervention on prevention of major depression in 14-15-year-old adolescents. Moreover, the effect on other selected mental health parameters are investigated.
DOC.criteria: mild to moderate level depressive symptoms (RBDI selfreport scale) adequate knowledge of the Finnish language informed consent from the adolescent (all) and his/her parent (under 15 years) healthy controls comprise subjects with no depressive symptoms ongoing major depression, dysthymia or bipolar disorder ongoing other severe psychiatric illness precluding group participation mental retardation
